10 Toast Tips From Toast Tips Twitter Followers

When we spotted the Twitter trending topic #letsmaketoast, we just couldn’t resist asking our followers how they would finish that sentence. Below are some of our favorite responses… Let’s make toast… …in the SAUNAAA. —@jmillerxo …somewhere we can get caught. —@HethurrDee …as soon as we can. —@IrresistibleJen …before and after work. —@Ash_S...
